product_name: Stansport Top Load Dry Bag - 80L - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A great dry bag for rafting, canoeing or anytime you're hauling gear around open water, this 80-liter bag has a watertight, roll-top seal and compression straps to keep your equipment dry and secure.
short_description: A great dry bag for rafting, canoeing or anytime you're hauling gear around open water, this 80-liter bag has a watertight, roll-top seal and compression straps to keep your equipment dry and secure.
